original_text: So they went quickly to Bethlehem. When they got there, they found Mary and Joseph with the baby. The baby really was lying in a food box.
korean_text: 빨리 가서 마리아와 요셉과 구유에 누인 아기를 찾아서

sentences.original_text: So they went quickly to Bethlehem.
they found Mary and Joseph with the baby.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아기와 함께 있는 마리아와 요셉을 발견했습니다.

sentences.original_text: The baby really was lying in a food box.
sentences.korean_translation: 아기는 정말로 먹이 상자에 누워 있었습니다.
